content.text: [@bob](@iL6NzQoOLFP18pCpprkbY80DMtiG4JFFtVSVUaoGsOQ=.ed25519) Yep, exactly. Their existence is useful, but as long as you're within the pub's hops you don't need to follow it directly. I think my ideal would be to join small private pubs whose friends are a subset of my friends, which guarantees connectivity without invoking [the rando problem](%OkgDsogCxesWEWn77Znu2alWlqNTpZVgRI4AWxcckBc=.sha256) of public pubs.
